item.title: Jetson TX2 - Check system information
item.description: System Info System info $ uname -a Linux unisem-desktop 4.9.140-tegra #1 SMP PREEMPT Mon Dec 9 22:52:02 PST 2019 aarch64 aarch64 aarch64 GNU/Linux OS $ cat /etc/lsb-release Memory

item.title: Jetson TX2 tips
item.description: RTSP Viewer RTSP_PATH=rtsp://id:pwd@1.1.1.1:3000/Streaming/Channels/101/ gst-launch-1.0 rtspsrc location="$RTSP_PATH" latency=500 ! rtph264depay ! h264parse ! nvv4l2decoder enable-max-performance=1 ! nvoverlaysink overlay-x=800 overlay-y=50 overlay-w=640 overlay-h=480 overlay=2
